parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current sum of mass from items stored in all unit's containers, linked items and weapons.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''loadAbs''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Player weight:<code>_weight = loadAbs player;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[load]], [[loadBackpack]], [[loadUniform]], [[loadVest]], [[getMass]], [[weightRTD]], [[getContainerMaxLoad]]
</value></part></template></root>
